# cook your code here
def rev(n):
    return int(str(n)[::-1])
def check(n):
    r=int(str(n)[::-1])
    if(r==n):
        return 1
    else:
        return 0
n=input()
for i in range (0,n):
    a=input()
    a=int(a)
    cnt=0
    while(check(a)!=1):
        b=rev(a)
        a=a+b
        cnt=cnt+1
    print cnt," ",a
